sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { EmployeeAPIClient, EmployeeDto } from '../Shared/api-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employee', templateUrl: './employee.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employee.component.css'], providers: [EmployeeAPIClient] }) export class EmployeeComponent { constructor(private service: EmployeeAPIClient) { } Employee: EmployeeDto[] = []; ngOnInit() { this.getemployeedetails(); } getemployeedetails() { this.service.getAllEmployees().subscribe(res => { this.Employee = res; }) } }

Employee

pkEmpId EmpName EmpSalary EmailId password fkRelation
{{ob.pkEmpId}} {{ob.empName}} {{ob.empSalary}} {{ob.emailId}} {{ob.password}} {{ob.fkRelation}}
